author: pk910
content:
the genesis is generated here: https://github.com/ephemery-testnet/ephemery-genesis
but in behind it's using the ethereum-genesis-generator as used for kurtosis testnets.
there is a branch for it: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-genesis-generator/tree/ephemery-genesis 

what changes do you want to make?
